name: Antarctica (ThemHandsomeFellas)
description:
Game made by Them Handsome Fellas para la Game Jam This Is Chile 2021.

Members:

  • Jose Abalos Lira: Santiago, Chile; 34 years old, jose@joseabalos.com
  • Enrique Barrios Jorquera: Santiago, Chile; 34 years old, ebarriosj@gmail.com

Main contact point: Jose Abalos, jose@joseabalos.com

This game features the following asset packs from the Unity Asset Store

  1. DoozyUI byDoozy Entertainment: UI
  2. Xelu's Free Controllers & Keyboard Prompts: UI prompts
  3. Polygon Prototype by Synty Studios: sun and moon UI icons
  4. Character Movement Fundamentals by Jan Ott: character controller
  5. Low Poly World - North by Mixaill: 3D art
  6. Low Poly Ultimate Pack by Polyperfect: 3D art
  7. Ultimate Game Music Collection by John Leonard French: music
  8. Ultimate SFX Bundle by Sidearm Studios: sound FX
  9. freesound.org: sound FX
  10. Polygon Arsenal by Archanor VFX: particles.
  11. Basic Motions by Kevin Iglesias: Animations
